### Government Tender Announcement

#### IT Audit Methodology, Training, Advice and Practice Review

**Reference Number:** cb-170-1953673
**Solicitation Number:** 410
**Amendment Number:** 7
**Publication Date:** 2023-12-19
**Tender Closing Date:** 2024-01-29T14:00:00
**Amendment Date:** 2024-01-29
**Expected Contract Start Date:** 2024-02-01
**Expected Contract End Date:** 2027-01-31
**Procurement Status:** Expired
**UNSPSC Code:** 84111600 (Audit services)

The Office of the Auditor General of Canada is seeking proposals for the provision of IT Audit Methodology, Training, Advice and Practice Review services. The contract will spans three years with the option to extend for two additional one-year periods. This procurement is subject to the provisions of several trade agreements, including the Canadian Free Trade Agreement and the World Trade Organization–Agreement on Government Procurement.

**Objective:**
The office requires a contractor to provide expertise in IT audit methodology, training, and practice review. This includes developing and implementing audit plans, conducting training sessions, and providing advice on improving auditing practices.

**Security Clearances:**
Resource personnel must hold a reliability clearance as a minimum security level.

**Submission Requirements:**
Proposals must be submitted electronically through the Canada Buy Service. The following documents must be included:

* A completed proposal document
* A signed declaration
* A detailed description of the proposed services
* Resumes of key personnel
* A detailed bid schedule

**Weeks 1-4:** Bidders must submit an acknowledgement of receipt and an electronic copy of their proposal.

**Evaluation Criteria:**
The proposal will be evaluated on the following criteria:

* Technical merit (40%)
* Price (40%)
* Past work experience (10%)
* Business capabilities and qualifications (10%)

**Questions and Answers:**
The office has addressed several questions from bidders through the following amendments: amendment 1 extends the submission deadline, amendment 2 modifies the minimum mandatory resource qualifications and experience, and amendment 3 addresses additional bidder inquiries.

Contact information:
The contracting authority is Soo Yeon Cho, whose email address is [suppliers@oag-bvg.gc.ca](mailto:suppliers@oag-bvg.gc.ca). The phone number is 613-952-0213.
